source:
%%sql
-- Build ims_integration_dim table -- merge

-- Notes - Addresses are only supplied for Inspectors - need to check inspector count against addresses data

-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW ims_integration_dim_new 

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.ims_integration_number IS NULL
        THEN T3.IMSIntegrationID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                     AS IMSIntegrationID, -- surrogate key
    'No Info'                               AS IntegrationID,
    'No Info'                               AS IntegrationIDCoded,
    T1.name                                 AS IMSIntegrationName,
    T1.date_entered                         AS IMSIntegrationDateEntered,
    T1.date_modified                        AS IMSIntegrationDateModified,
    T1.modified_user_id                     AS IMSIntegrationModifiedUserID,
    T1.modified_by_name                     AS IMSIntegrationModifiedByName,
    T1.created_by                           AS IMSIntegrationCreatedBy,
    T1.created_by_name                      AS IMSIntegrationCreatedByName,
    T1.description                          AS IMSIntegrationDescription,
    T1.deleted                              AS IMSIntegrationDeleted,
    T1.created_by_link                      AS IMSIntegrationCreatedByLink,
    T1.modified_user_link                   AS IMSIntegrationModifiedUserLink,
    T1.assigned_user_id                     AS IMSIntegrationAssignedUserID,
    T1.assigned_user_name                   AS IMSIntegrationAssignedUserName,
    T1.assigned_user_link                   AS IMSIntegrationAssignedUserLink,
    T1.securitygroups                       AS IMSIntegrationSecurityGroups,
    T1.ims_integration_number               AS IMSIntegrationNumber,
    T1.type                                 AS IMSIntegrationType,
    T1.status                               AS IMSIntegrationStatus,
    T1.priority                             AS IMSIntegrationPriority,
    T1.resolution                           AS IMSIntegrationResolution,
    T1.work_log                             AS IMSIntegrationWorkLog,
    T1.commission_date_c                    AS IMSIntegrationCommissionDate,
    T1.decommission_date_c                  AS IMSIntegrationDecommissionDate,
    T1.frequency_c                          AS IMSIntegrationFrequency,
    T1.int_num_container_c                  AS IMSIntegrationNumberContainer,
    T1.internal_external_c                  AS IMSIntegrationInternalExternal,
    T1.help                                 AS IMSIntegrationHelp,
    T1.encryption_in_transit                AS IMSIntegrationEncryptionInTransit,
    T1.ims_ropa_ims_integration_1           AS IMSROPAIMSIntegration,
    T1.ims_dpia_ims_integration_1           AS IMSDPIAIMSIntegration,
    T1.ims_data_sharing_ims_integration_1   AS IMSDataSharingIMSIntegration,
    T1.ims_integration_ims_data_flow_1      AS IMSIntegrationIMSDataflow,
    T2.SourceSystemID                       AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)          AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                    AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat( 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        IFNULL(T1.name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_entered,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_by_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.description,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.deleted,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.securitygroups,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_integration_number,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.resolution,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.work_log,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.commission_date_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.decommission_date_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.frequency_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.int_num_container_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.internal_external_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.help,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.encryption_in_transit,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_ropa_ims_integration_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_dpia_ims_integration_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_data_sharing_ims_integration_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_integration_ims_data_flow_1,'.'))
        )                                   AS RowID, 
    'Y'                                     AS IsActive, 
    T3.IsActive                             AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_intergration_new T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON  "IMS" = T2.Description AND 
        T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.ims_integration_dim T3 
    ON  T1.ims_integration_number = T3.IMSIntegrationNumber AND 
        T3.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN    T1.ims_integration_number = T3.IMSIntegrationNumber AND 
                    md5(concat(
                        '.',
                        '.',
                        IFNULL(T1.name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_entered,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_id,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.modified_by_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.created_by,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.created_by_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.description,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.deleted,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.created_by_link,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_link,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_id,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_link,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.securitygroups,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_integration_number,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.resolution,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.work_log,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.commission_date_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.decommission_date_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.frequency_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.int_num_container_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.internal_external_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.help,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.encryption_in_transit,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_ropa_ims_integration_1,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_dpia_ims_integration_1,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_data_sharing_ims_integration_1,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_integration_ims_data_flow_1,'.'))) <> T3.RowID     
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.IMSIntegrationID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.ims_integration_number IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_intergration_new);

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **ims_integration_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View ims_integration_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW ims_integration_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

SELECT DISTINCT
    IMSIntegrationID,
    IntegrationID,
    IntegrationIDCoded,
    IMSIntegrationName,
    IMSIntegrationDateEntered,
    IMSIntegrationDateModified,
    IMSIntegrationModifiedUserID,
    IMSIntegrationModifiedByName,
    IMSIntegrationCreatedBy,
    IMSIntegrationCreatedByName,
    IMSIntegrationDescription,
    IMSIntegrationDeleted,
    IMSIntegrationCreatedByLink,
    IMSIntegrationModifiedUserLink,
    IMSIntegrationAssignedUserID,
    IMSIntegrationAssignedUserName,
    IMSIntegrationAssignedUserLink,
    IMSIntegrationSecurityGroups,
    IMSIntegrationNumber,
    IMSIntegrationType,
    IMSIntegrationStatus,
    IMSIntegrationPriority,
    IMSIntegrationResolution,
    IMSIntegrationWorkLog,
    IMSIntegrationCommissionDate,
    IMSIntegrationDecommissionDate,
    IMSIntegrationFrequency,
    IMSIntegrationNumberContainer,
    IMSIntegrationInternalExternal,
    IMSIntegrationHelp,
    IMSIntegrationEncryptionInTransit,
    IMSROPAIMSIntegration,
    IMSDPIAIMSIntegration,
    IMSDataSharingIMSIntegration,
    IMSIntegrationIMSDataflow,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From ims_integration_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT DISTINCT
    IMSIntegrationID,
    IntegrationID,
    IntegrationIDCoded,
    IMSIntegrationName,
    IMSIntegrationDateEntered,
    IMSIntegrationDateModified,
    IMSIntegrationModifiedUserID,
    IMSIntegrationModifiedByName,
    IMSIntegrationCreatedBy,
    IMSIntegrationCreatedByName,
    IMSIntegrationDescription,
    IMSIntegrationDeleted,
    IMSIntegrationCreatedByLink,
    IMSIntegrationModifiedUserLink,
    IMSIntegrationAssignedUserID,
    IMSIntegrationAssignedUserName,
    IMSIntegrationAssignedUserLink,
    IMSIntegrationSecurityGroups,
    IMSIntegrationNumber,
    IMSIntegrationType,
    IMSIntegrationStatus,
    IMSIntegrationPriority,
    IMSIntegrationResolution,
    IMSIntegrationWorkLog,
    IMSIntegrationCommissionDate,
    IMSIntegrationDecommissionDate,
    IMSIntegrationFrequency,
    IMSIntegrationNumberContainer,
    IMSIntegrationInternalExternal,
    IMSIntegrationHelp,
    IMSIntegrationEncryptionInTransit,
    IMSROPAIMSIntegration,
    IMSDPIAIMSIntegration,
    IMSDataSharingIMSIntegration,
    IMSIntegrationIMSDataflow,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.ims_integration_dim
WHERE IMSIntegrationNumber IN (SELECT IMSIntegrationNumber FROM ims_integration_dim_new WHERE IMSIntegrationID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM ims_integration_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW ims_integration_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    IMSIntegrationID,
    IntegrationID,
    IntegrationIDCoded,
    IMSIntegrationName,
    IMSIntegrationDateEntered,
    IMSIntegrationDateModified,
    IMSIntegrationModifiedUserID,
    IMSIntegrationModifiedByName,
    IMSIntegrationCreatedBy,
    IMSIntegrationCreatedByName,
    IMSIntegrationDescription,
    IMSIntegrationDeleted,
    IMSIntegrationCreatedByLink,
    IMSIntegrationModifiedUserLink,
    IMSIntegrationAssignedUserID,
    IMSIntegrationAssignedUserName,
    IMSIntegrationAssignedUserLink,
    IMSIntegrationSecurityGroups,
    IMSIntegrationNumber,
    IMSIntegrationType,
    IMSIntegrationStatus,
    IMSIntegrationPriority,
    IMSIntegrationResolution,
    IMSIntegrationWorkLog,
    IMSIntegrationCommissionDate,
    IMSIntegrationDecommissionDate,
    IMSIntegrationFrequency,
    IMSIntegrationNumberContainer,
    IMSIntegrationInternalExternal,
    IMSIntegrationHelp,
    IMSIntegrationEncryptionInTransit,
    IMSROPAIMSIntegration,
    IMSDPIAIMSIntegration,
    IMSDataSharingIMSIntegration,
    IMSIntegrationIMSDataflow,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM ims_integration_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View ims_integration_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Pers_No from SAP HR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.ims_integration_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.ims_integration_dim AS Target
USING ims_integration_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.IMSIntegrationID = Target.IMSIntegrationID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (IMSIntegrationID,
        IntegrationID,
        IntegrationIDCoded,
        IMSIntegrationName,
        IMSIntegrationDateEntered,
        IMSIntegrationDateModified,
        IMSIntegrationModifiedUserID,
        IMSIntegrationModifiedByName,
        IMSIntegrationCreatedBy,
        IMSIntegrationCreatedByName,
        IMSIntegrationDescription,
        IMSIntegrationDeleted,
        IMSIntegrationCreatedByLink,
        IMSIntegrationModifiedUserLink,
        IMSIntegrationAssignedUserID,
        IMSIntegrationAssignedUserName,
        IMSIntegrationAssignedUserLink,
        IMSIntegrationSecurityGroups,
        IMSIntegrationNumber,
        IMSIntegrationType,
        IMSIntegrationStatus,
        IMSIntegrationPriority,
        IMSIntegrationResolution,
        IMSIntegrationWorkLog,
        IMSIntegrationCommissionDate,
        IMSIntegrationDecommissionDate,
        IMSIntegrationFrequency,
        IMSIntegrationNumberContainer,
        IMSIntegrationInternalExternal,
        IMSIntegrationHelp,
        IMSIntegrationEncryptionInTransit,
        IMSROPAIMSIntegration,
        IMSDPIAIMSIntegration,
        IMSDataSharingIMSIntegration,
        IMSIntegrationIMSDataflow,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.IMSIntegrationID,
        Source.IntegrationID,
        Source.IntegrationIDCoded,
        Source.IMSIntegrationName,
        Source.IMSIntegrationDateEntered,
        Source.IMSIntegrationDateModified,
        Source.IMSIntegrationModifiedUserID,
        Source.IMSIntegrationModifiedByName,
        Source.IMSIntegrationCreatedBy,
        Source.IMSIntegrationCreatedByName,
        Source.IMSIntegrationDescription,
        Source.IMSIntegrationDeleted,
        Source.IMSIntegrationCreatedByLink,
        Source.IMSIntegrationModifiedUserLink,
        Source.IMSIntegrationAssignedUserID,
        Source.IMSIntegrationAssignedUserName,
        Source.IMSIntegrationAssignedUserLink,
        Source.IMSIntegrationSecurityGroups,
        Source.IMSIntegrationNumber,
        Source.IMSIntegrationType,
        Source.IMSIntegrationStatus,
        Source.IMSIntegrationPriority,
        Source.IMSIntegrationResolution,
        Source.IMSIntegrationWorkLog,
        Source.IMSIntegrationCommissionDate,
        Source.IMSIntegrationDecommissionDate,
        Source.IMSIntegrationFrequency,
        Source.IMSIntegrationNumberContainer,
        Source.IMSIntegrationInternalExternal,
        Source.IMSIntegrationHelp,
        Source.IMSIntegrationEncryptionInTransit,
        Source.IMSROPAIMSIntegration,
        Source.IMSDPIAIMSIntegration,
        Source.IMSDataSharingIMSIntegration,
        Source.IMSIntegrationIMSDataflow,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive) ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.ims_integration_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new SecureInfoID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.ims_integration_dim 

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY IMSIntegrationID NULLS LAST) AS IMSIntegrationID,
    IntegrationID,
    IntegrationIDCoded,
    IMSIntegrationName,
    IMSIntegrationDateEntered,
    IMSIntegrationDateModified,
    IMSIntegrationModifiedUserID,
    IMSIntegrationModifiedByName,
    IMSIntegrationCreatedBy,
    IMSIntegrationCreatedByName,
    IMSIntegrationDescription,
    IMSIntegrationDeleted,
    IMSIntegrationCreatedByLink,
    IMSIntegrationModifiedUserLink,
    IMSIntegrationAssignedUserID,
    IMSIntegrationAssignedUserName,
    IMSIntegrationAssignedUserLink,
    IMSIntegrationSecurityGroups,
    IMSIntegrationNumber,
    IMSIntegrationType,
    IMSIntegrationStatus,
    IMSIntegrationPriority,
    IMSIntegrationResolution,
    IMSIntegrationWorkLog,
    IMSIntegrationCommissionDate,
    IMSIntegrationDecommissionDate,
    IMSIntegrationFrequency,
    IMSIntegrationNumberContainer,
    IMSIntegrationInternalExternal,
    IMSIntegrationHelp,
    IMSIntegrationEncryptionInTransit,
    IMSROPAIMSIntegration,
    IMSDPIAIMSIntegration,
    IMSDataSharingIMSIntegration,
    IMSIntegrationIMSDataflow,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.ims_integration_dim ;
